meanings.definition: A type of plant with long, tough leaves and small, inconspicuous flowers.
meanings.sent1: The aspidistras in the corner of the room add a touch of green to the space.
meanings.sent2: She watered the aspidistras in the garden every morning to keep them healthy.
meanings.sent3: The aspidistras seemed to be gossiping with the other plants about the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The aspidistras stood tall like guardians, protecting the smaller flowers around them.
meanings.sent5: The aspidistras' leaves were as tough as armor, shielding the delicate flowers beneath.

meanings.definition: Plural form of 'aspidistra', referring to multiple plants of this type.
meanings.sent1: The aspidistras in the office brighten up the space with their green leaves.
meanings.sent2: We bought a few new aspidistras to add to our collection of indoor plants.
meanings.sent3: The aspidistras at the plant sale were chatting excitedly about finding new homes.
meanings.sent4: The aspidistras in the garden danced in the wind, a graceful group of greenery.
meanings.sent5: The aspidistras lined up along the path like soldiers, standing at attention in the sunlight.
